snippet: In announcing the Cossacks would be paid to maintain public order, Governor Aleksandr Tkachev of the Krasnodar region, site of the 2014 Olympics, stressed the need to control the migration of darker-skinned Muslims from the North Caucasus.
lead_paragraph: In announcing the Cossacks would be paid to maintain public order, Governor Aleksandr Tkachev of the Krasnodar region, site of the 2014 Olympics, stressed the need to control the migration of darker-skinned Muslims from the North Caucasus.

headline.seo: A Call to Investigate Russian Governor’s Comments
headline.main: A Call to Investigate Russian Governor’s Comments
headline.print_headline: A Call to Investigate Russian Governor’s Comments
